name: binakata
description: Platform pembelajaran adaptif untuk anak disleksia

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:ml
scripts.install:ml: cd ml-service && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:setup: cd frontend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:ml" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules ml-service/__pycache__ frontend/.next backend/dist

author: Tim BinaKata
